# Draft:Edward B. Gager

Edward Baker Gager (August 30, 1852 â€“ April 28, 1922) was a justice of the Connecticut Supreme Court from 1918 to 1922.
Born on his father's farm in Scotland, Connecticut, graduated from Natchaug High School in Willimanticin 1877. Two of his contemporaries on the court and its Reporter were classmates.
